✅ Bucket list

Things I want to do before I die. Please let me know if you have any recommendations.
I started adding the dates next to the checkmarks to remind myself how far I’ve come, and how much is left to do!

  1. Learn a Foreign Language
  2. Live in another country
  3. Visit Singapore
  4. Meet Prof. David J. Malan
  5. Go camping
  6. Visit Dubai
  7. Start a non-profit organization
  8. Read 1000 books
  9. Write a book
  10. Sing in front of an audience
  11. Meet the Dalai Lama
  12. Go on an African Safari
  13. Visit Kashmir
  14. Go to Tomorrowland
  15. Teach an online course
  16. Become a professor
  17. Christmas in New York
  18. Start a company
  19. Take my first train journey: 19.07.2019
  20. Meet Stephen Hawking: Sadly he passed away in 2018.
  21. Meet HC Verma
  22. Learn to play Guitar
  23. Visit Saint Petersburgh
  24. Visit Tehran
  25. Debate at the Oxford Union
  26. Visit Bhutan
  27. Vacation in Maldives
  28. Watch football game at the Bernabeu
  29. Visit Old Trafford
  30. Visit Disneyland
  31. Attend TED conference
  32. Visit Googleplex
  33. Visit Apple Park
  34. Take a selfie outside the Taj Mahal
  35. Go on a hike
  36. Climb the Great Wall of China
  37. Climb the pyramids of Giza
  38. Go on a overseas trip with my whole family
  39. Take a hot air balloon ride
  40. Go scuba diving
  41. Fly an airplane

For suggestions please send me an email, or reach out on Twitter.

If you are the GitHub type, you can directly suggest on GitHub.
